topic.title: Does Zeronet auto update itself?
topic.body: The first time you launch it downloads the latest version, but going forward, does it continue to update itself?

1_1D23PF8qUcwm4ZfjKgThcH4wnVQWzue6Jo.body:
Cool, thanks!

> [nofish](#comment_597_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Not automatically, but you can make it update to latest development version by pressing the ... > Version menu item on ZeroHello.
> If new important and tested version is out you will see a notification message.
